products.name: Hello Kitty
products.description: Anthropomorphized white cat with a red bow and no visible mouth.

products.name: My Melody
products.description: White rabbit character depicted as always wearing a bright red or pink hood that covers her ears.

products.name: Kuromi
products.description: White rabbit character wearing a black jester's hat with a pink skull on the front and a black "devil" tail in the place of a normal rabbit's tail.

products.name: Unicorno
products.description: Unicorn character found a hidden magical kingdom.

products.name: Punkstar
products.description: Characters that are a band of neighborhood kids that got together to restore an abandoned karaoke machine factory into the ULTIMATE hangout.

products.name: Cinnamoroll
products.description: Character depicted as a white dog with a curly tail that resembles a cinnamon roll, and long ears he can fly with.

products.name: Gudetama
products.description: Character that is an anthropomorphized egg yolk whose main trait is laziness.

products.name: Aggressive Retsuko
products.description: Female red panda character portrayed as an administrative assistant in a Japanese business, relieving the stress of an oppressive and frustrating working life by drinking and singing angry death metal in a karaoke bar.

products.name: Ichigoman
products.description: Character depicted with strawberry ears and a red superhero suit.

products.name: Keroppi
products.description: Frog character with large eyes and a V-shaped mouth.
